description: Increases the Pokémon's passive Exp. Point gain while it has the fewest Exp. Points on its team. In addition, when a nearby teammate defeats a wild Pokémon, that teammate gains slightly more Exp. Points.

special.description: While the Pokémon has the fewest Exp. Points on its team, it gains {xpPerSec} more Exp. Points per second. In addition, when a nearby teammate defeats a wild Pokémon, that teammate gains slightly more Exp. Points.
